title: Font Similar to Ballpark or Tideway Script
content: Are there any other fonts that are similar to ballpark script or tideaway script?
author: Capnhud

comments.content:
I don't know Tideaway, but these are in Ballpark's ballpark:

[Casey](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214062919/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/casey)  
 [Metroscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214062919/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=ALSO-MESR)  
 [Philly Sport Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214062919/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/philly_sport_script_ot_std_urw/)  
 [Fenway Park](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214062919/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000019)

If any of the aforementioned (all excellent choices) are a little too rich for your blood, you might consider my lowly (and less expensive) [Moonshine Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214062919/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/moonshine-script-nf/).

I appreciate all the suggestions I knew there had to be more out there. Casey is gorgeous

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
I know I am in my own little world, but its ok. They know me here
